thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Berry Global Group Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.20

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Berry Global Group Reports Q1 EPS Of $1.20
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Berry Global Group Inc:
* BERRY GLOBAL GROUP, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.20 * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 * Q1 SALES ROSE 18 PERCENT TO $1.8 BILLION * INCREASED GUIDANCE FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018 CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS TO $1,007 MILLION AND ADJUSTED FREE CASH FLOW TO $630 MILLION
* FISCAL 2018 CAPITAL SPENDING AND CASH INTEREST COSTS ARE FORECASTED TO BE $340 MILLION AND $250 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.64, REVENUE VIEW $1.79 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
